summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from November 24, 2019, discussing a New York Post report that Prince Andrew met with Ghislaine Maxwell in London in June 2019. The email shows FBI agents coordinating to ensure proactive efforts to locate Maxwell before obtaining probable cause for her arrest.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Forwards a news report about Prince Andrew meeting Ghislaine Maxwell to FBI contacts, noting he has no idea if the report is accurate.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Subject of a news report forwarded in the email chain, which claims he met with Ghislaine Maxwell in London in June 2019.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as 'Epstein's gal pal' in a forwarded news report. The FBI email chain discusses ensuring proactive efforts to locate her for potential arrest.

connections.description: A forwarded news report claims the two met in London in June 2019.
Maxwell is referred to in the email's subject line as 'Epstein's gal pal'.

events.title: Reported meeting between Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A New York Post report claims Prince Andrew met with Ghislaine Maxwell in London.

events.title: FBI internal coordination on Maxwell
events.description: FBI agents exchange emails discussing the need for proactive efforts to locate Ghislaine Maxwell to arrest her once probable cause is obtained.

keyFacts: An FBI email chain from November 24, 2019, shows agents discussing proactive efforts to locate Ghislaine Maxwell for a potential arrest.
U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman forwarded a news report claiming Prince Andrew met with Maxwell in London in June 2019, though he expressed uncertainty about its accuracy.
The email indicates the FBI was actively planning for Maxwell's arrest months before she was actually apprehended in July 2020.
The communication reveals coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the FBI regarding the investigation into Epstein's associates.
